thread.title: BRIEF-Lilly And China's NCCD Announce Collaboration To Advance Scientific Understanding And Care For People Living With Diabetes And Cardiovascular Disease

title: BRIEF-Lilly And China's NCCD Announce Collaboration To Advance Scientific Understanding And Care For People Living With Diabetes And Cardiovascular Disease

organizations.name: people living with diabetes and cardiovascular disease reuters

text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Eli Lilly and Co:
* LILLY AND CHINA’S NCCD ANNOUNCE COLLABORATION TO ADVANCE SCIENTIFIC UNDERSTANDING AND CARE FOR PEOPLE LIVING WITH DIABETES AND CARDIOVASCULAR DISEASE
* ELI LILLY - DEAL BETWEEN CHINA’S NATIONAL CENTER FOR CARDIOVASCULAR DISEASES & CO AIMS TO IMPROVE CARE FOR PEOPLE LIVING WITH TYPE 2 DIABETES IN CHINA
* ELI LILLY - PLANS TO COLLABORATE ACROSS 4 INITIATIVES TO ADVANCE SCIENTIFIC UNDERSTANDING OF TYPE 2 DIABETES & RELATED COMPLICATIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
